classes.title: Introduction to Alpine Climbing
classes.shortDescription: Learn the basics of mountaineering in this beginner-friendly course.
classes.description: This comprehensive course covers the fundamental skills needed for alpine climbing. From rope management to ice axe techniques, you'll gain confidence in the mountains under expert guidance.
classes.instructorBio: Former National Park ranger with 15+ years of alpine guiding experience.

whatWeProvide: All technical climbing equipment (harness, helmet, ice axe)
details.priceNote: All technical equipment and materials included

classes.title: Advanced Ice Climbing
classes.shortDescription: Take your ice climbing skills to the next level with professional instruction.
classes.description: Designed for experienced climbers, this advanced course focuses on technical ice climbing skills in challenging alpine environments. Learn how to lead on ice, manage complex anchors, and climb with efficiency and safety.
classes.instructorBio: Professional alpine guide with expeditions on four continents.

whatToBring: Personal ice climbing gear (if you have it)
Insulated and waterproof apparel for cold conditions
whatWeProvide: Technical ice climbing equipment (can be rented if needed)
details.priceNote: Basic equipment included; specialized personal gear available for rent

classes.title: Winter Survival Skills
classes.shortDescription: Essential knowledge for staying safe in harsh winter mountain conditions.
classes.description: Learn critical survival techniques for winter expeditions. This course covers everything from building snow shelters to avalanche assessment, and emergency first aid in cold environments.
classes.instructorBio: Wilderness survival expert and former search and rescue team leader.

whatToBring: Sleeping bag rated for 0Â°F or lower
details.priceNote: Includes overnight camping experience and all meals

classes.title: Rock Climbing Fundamentals
classes.shortDescription: Master the essential techniques for outdoor rock climbing.
classes.description: Build a solid foundation in rock climbing skills with this comprehensive course. Perfect for those transitioning from indoor to outdoor climbing, you'll learn proper technique, safety protocols, and gain confidence on natural rock.
classes.instructorBio: Certified climbing instructor with 12 years of experience.

whatToBring: Day pack with water and snacks
Personal climbing gear if you have it
whatWeProvide: Transportation from meeting point to climbing areas
details.priceNote: Equipment rental included in price if needed
